channel.title: 317 server
channel.description: on my 317 server sometin went worng with pestcontrol (i got it fixed) and i want to give people bak there points how can i add it to their account?

item.title: 317 server
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

lemons burn:

Go to there char files and there should be a text of something like Points = N

Sorry but the char files for the points are located in a file usually defined as “MoreInfo”
If he were to go to the normal char files then he would be completely lost looking over it clueless for the points.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

dragonman2:

on my 317 server sometin went worng with pestcontrol (i got it fixed) and i want to give people bak there points how can i add it to their account?

If you trust your members and you do not have backed up accounts…
You would have to go through maybe moreinfo, Inside of their account on more info you should find a number that equals to their pestpoints…
The pestpoints number will be defined so don’t worry about random numbers.

Now either you could go through player to player and ask how many points they had each and return their points or give each player that lost their points like 100 each or 200 each nothing ridiculously high that would ruin your servers economy.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

quick answer is you cant. If you messed something up and the points got deleted then its bad luck. OR if you really wanted to you could do a rollback(provided you have char backups)

Read full topic
